definitions.example: He is the only doctor for miles.

definitions.definition: Without sibling; without a sibling of the same gender.
definitions.example: He is their only son, in fact, an only child.

definitions.definition: Without others or anything further; exclusively.
definitions.example: My heart is hers, and hers only.
If there were only one more ticket!

definitions.definition: Used to express surprise or consternation at an action.
definitions.example: She's only gone and run off with the milkman!

definitions.definition: Introduces a disappointing or surprising outcome that renders futile something previously mentioned. See also only to, only for.
definitions.example: I helped him out only for him to betray me.
You're welcome to borrow my bicycle, only please take care of it.
I would enjoy running, only I have this broken leg.
